We guarantee you 100% of the resources that your package contains.

We have a blazing fast network, all of our servers are based on 100mbit connections to ensure quality and speed for your websites/applications.

Our VPS nodes are based on Intel Dual Core/Quad Core CPU's (Includes Core2Duo, Core2Quad and Quad Core Xeon) with 8GB to 16GB RAM, RAID1 Hard Disk Drives for redundancy and security of your data, and 100mbit connections based on high quality bandwidth providers.
